body: However, instead of going after General Hua, she went straight for Liu at the yamen and light the place on fire. General Hua's men arrives and urges the paladin to run away before Liu's men arrives, which paladin Ho refuses, saying "After the death of my father, there's no place that would accept me. Run, but where should I run to?" (Rough translation) The soldiers have great respect for the paladin's heroism, but under the order of Liu, they have no choice but to carry on with the execution. Which is why her execution is relatively not as brutal as the bandits before her. (No mutilation)

The Paladin (The last girl), goes by the name Ho San Chun. General Hua has anticipated that she would seek revenge for the inhumane treatment of the bandits. So he orders the his men to capture her alive, and do not let the Liu (Another high ranking official) knows about it before he heads off to the capital to see the emperor. The paladin is rather well known in the area, has done many good deeds and was a mentor of General Hua. So General Hua does not wish to see her captured by the local authority and face the same punishment as other criminals.

There's a General goes by the name Hua, initially he doesn't really care about the bandits operating in the region. However, the 7 bandits hate General Hua to the bones. So they kidnap all 4 of his wives, let the henchmen rape them, and subject his wives to Lingchi (A form of torture and execution, as seen in this Doujinshi.) The bodies are chopped into pieces and stuff into the barrel, then thrown into the river. A wandering paladin intercepts the barrels and handed them over to General Hua.(Page 6). Infuriated by the act, General Hua ordered the capture and the execution of the 7 bandits respondible for the death of his wives.

Ok, here's roughly the story of this Doujinshi. The story takes place at a fictional province during the Qing dynasty. A province infamous for the unusual large numbers of female bandits and the brutal punishment against the offenders. There's a lengthy backstory explaining how the brutal punishment comes to be, why the women don't commit suicide to avoid being subjected to inhumane treatment etc.. The 7 women who receive brutal torture, mutilation and execution are bandits. They are akin to Roblin hood, who robs the rich and give to the poor.
